lyrics:
Oh, yeah
I'm just a love machine
And I won't work for nobody but you
Yeah, baby, I'm just a love machine
A hugging kissing fiend

I think it's high time you knew
Whenever I think of you
My mind blows a fuse (baby)
When I look[...]
